aka: Big Sur Holy Weed, BSHW, BSHB

articles.author: Leafly Podcasts
articles.text:
What Are You Smoking? features Leafly experts Will Hyde and Bailey Rahn, as well as guests from all corners of the cannabis industry reviewing strains, test-firing products, offering up pro tips, and answering your toughest cannabis questions.
Leafly Podcast
What Are You Smoking?
Episode 37: Cannabis History with David Bienenstock

In this episode: 
Veteran cannabis journalist and co-host of the podcast Great Moments in Weed History David Bienenstock visits the show to tell us what modern cannabis users should understand about the plant’s past.
We talk about stories and figures from cannabis history everyone should know, separating fact from fiction in cannabis history, and why the cannabis industry should work to change capitalism—not the other way around.
Want to learn more about the roots of the cannabis industry? You can read David Bienenstock’s work for Leafly, including his series on game-changing developments, here.

If you’ve got questions for our hosts, guests you’d like to hear, or have anything else to say about the show, email us at whatareyousmoking@leafly.com. Want to listen to previous episodes of the show? Find them here! And if you’re enjoying the show, we really appreciate you subscribing, rating, and reviewing it on iTunes or wherever you get your podcasts.
Strains & Products on This Episode:
The Big Sur Smoothie David is puffing on is a cross of Big Sur Holy Weed and Super Lemon Haze, while Bailey is enjoying a crop of Grape Ape. Will remains as dab-happy as ever, and is squishing up some Honey Bananas from House of Cultivar.
 





Meet Your Show Hosts
Bailey Rahn is an editor at Leafly specializing in cannabis strains and health. When she’s not at Leafly, you’ll likely find her smoking her way up a mountain or playing dress-up with her cats.

Will Hyde is a subject matter expert, strain specialist, and digital producer at Leafly. He spends his free time traveling and exploring creative outlets as a DJ, digital artist, and film producer.

About Our Music:
Music for “What Are You Smoking” is provided by Lusine. “Ticking Hands” is from his album Sensorimotor. “Two Dots” is from A Certain Distance. For more about Lusine, check out Ghostly.com.
articles.title: What Are You Smoking? Episode 37: Cannabis History With David Bienenstock

articles.author: Bailey Rahn
articles.text:
Thanks to all the Leafly users who submitted strain nominations this week! Our strain database now exceeds 1,000 varieties, but our collection is far from finished so keep the suggestions coming. Drizella, Star Berry Indica, Big Sur Holy Bud, Dream Police, and Purple Cheese are only a few among many newly added varieties, so don't forget to check out all of the other newcomers in the strain Explorer!
   1. Drizella
Characteristics of Drizella:

Mostly sativa
Cross between Cinderella 99, White Widow, and Space Queen
Breeder: Dynasty Seeds
Tropical pineapple, citrus, and vanilla aroma
Clear, stimulating cerebral effects
Indoor flowering time of 60 days

   2. Star Berry Indica
Characteristics of Star Berry Indica:

Mostly indica
Cross between Sensi Star and Blueberry
Breeder: CannaVenture
Lemon and berry aroma
Heavy, relaxing effects
Indoor flowering time of 60 days

 
   3. Dream Police
Characteristics of Dream Police:

Balanced hybrid
Cross between AK-47 and Dreamy Bubbles
Breeder: Crazy Diamonds
Spicy and sweet floral aroma
May help ease pain and stress
Indoor flowering time of 60 days

   4. Big Sur Holy Bud
Characteristics of Big Sur Holy Bud:

Mostly sativa
Unknown lineage
Breeder: Bodhi Seeds
Blueberry, menthol aroma
Uplifting cerebral effects

   5. Purple Cheese
Characteristics of Purple Cheese:

Indica-dominant autoflowering hybrid
Cross between Purple #1, Blue Cheese, and Lowryder
Breeder: Auto Seeds
Sweet, fruity aroma
Can exhibit a high CBD content
Powerful full-body relief
articles.title: New Strains Alert: Drizella, Star Berry Indica, Big Sur Holy Bud, Dream Police, and Purple Cheese

description: Big Sur Holy Bud is a sativa bred by Bodhi Seeds. This plant has an indica structure, with purple/pink hued buds that offer a blueberry, menthol aroma and effects true to its sativa heritage. This strain can be grown indoors and outdoors.
descriptionPlain: Big Sur Holy Bud is a sativa bred by Bodhi Seeds. This plant has an indica structure, with purple/pink hued buds that offer a blueberry, menthol aroma and effects true to its sativa heritage. This strain can be grown indoors and outdoors.

highlightedReviews.text: This is an energetic and euphoric high.  It has an amazingly potent terpine profile smelling of citrus, pine, and earth.  It was pretty trippy and make me appreciate light quality in a state of glittery awe.  The strain supported some good creative thought trains.  The buds are huge, and a little sloppy on the trim work, but beautiful none the less.  I would say the high is a little like super lemon haze, but a bit trippier and intense.  It’s great from an immediate attitude adjustment and stress relief.
This strain is great! Cerebral and euphoric high. Tastes and smelled great in my Pax pen. Highly recommended & rare strain.

name: Big Sur Holy Bud
